00022 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00023 // Function: getConnectionIndex()
00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 int getConnectionIndex(QList<Design::Interconnection> const& connections, QString const& name)
00026 {
00027     int index = -1;
00028 
00029     // Search for a match in the list.
00030     for (int i = 0; i < connections.size(); ++i)
00031     {
00032         if (connections[i].name == name)
00033         {
00034             index = i;
00035             break;
00036         }
00037     }
00038 
00039     return index;
00040 }
00041 
00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 // Function: getInstanceIndex()
00044 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 int getInstanceIndex(QList<Design::ComponentInstance> const& instances, QString const& instanceName)
00046 {
00047     int index = -1;
00048 
00049     // Search for a match in the list.
00050     for (int i = 0; i < instances.size(); ++i)
00051     {
00052         if (instances[i].instanceName == instanceName)
00053         {
00054             index = i;
00055             break;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 
00059     return index;
00060 }

00062 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 // Function: parseProgrammableElements()
00064 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 void parseProgrammableElements(LibraryInterface* lh, VLNV designVLNV,
00066                                QList<Design::ComponentInstance>& elements)
00067 {
00068     // The received type is always VLNV::DESIGN so it must be asked from the
00069     // library handler to make sure the type is correct.
00070     designVLNV.setType(lh->getDocumentType(designVLNV));
00071 
00072     if (!designVLNV.isValid())
00073     {
00074         return;
00075     }
00076 
00077     QSharedPointer<Design> compDesign;
00078     QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf;
00079 
00080     // Check if the component contains a direct reference to a design.
00081     if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGN)
00082     {
00083         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(designVLNV);
00084         compDesign = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00085     }
00086     // Otherwise check if the component had reference to a design configuration.
00087     else if (designVLNV.getType() == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION)
00088     {
00089         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(designVLNV);
00090         designConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00091 
00092         designVLNV = designConf->getDesignRef();
00093 
00094         if (designVLNV.isValid())
00095         {
00096             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(designVLNV);
00097             compDesign = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00098         }
00099 
00100         // If design configuration did not contain a reference to a design.
00101         if (!compDesign)
00102         {
00103             return;
00104         }
00105     }
00106     // If referenced view was not found.
00107     else
00108     {
00109         return;
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Go through all component instances and search for programmable elements.
00113     foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, compDesign->getComponentInstances())
00114     {
00115         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00116         QSharedPointer<Component> childComp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00117 
00118                 if (childComp)
00119                 {
00120                         // Add the component to the system design only if it is a leaf component and has a CPU
00121                         // or an attached SW design.
00122                         if ((!childComp->isHierarchical() && childComp->isCpu()) || childComp->findView("kts_sw_ref") != 0)
00123                         {
00124                                 elements.append(instance);
00125                         }
00126                         else
00127                         {
00128                 QString view = "";
00129 
00130                 if (designConf != 0)
00131                 {
00132                     view = designConf->getActiveView(instance.instanceName);
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 // Otherwise parse the hierarchical components recursively.
00136                                 parseProgrammableElements(lh, childComp->getHierRef(view), elements);
00137                         }
00138                 }
00139         }
00140 }

00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 // Function: addNewInstances()
00144 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 void addNewInstances(QList<Design::ComponentInstance> elements, Design& sysDesign, LibraryInterface* lh,
00146                      QString const& directory, QList<Design::ComponentInstance>& sysInstances)
00147 {
00148     foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& element, elements)
00149     {
00150         // Generate a VLNV.
00151         VLNV swVLNV(VLNV::COMPONENT, sysDesign.getVlnv()->getVendor(),
00152                     sysDesign.getVlnv()->getLibrary(),
00153                     sysDesign.getVlnv()->getName().remove(".design") + "_swmapping_" + element.instanceName + ".comp",
00154                     sysDesign.getVlnv()->getVersion());
00155 
00156         // Create the SW mapping component.
00157         QSharedPointer<Component> swComp(new Component(swVLNV));
00158         swComp->setComponentHierarchy(KactusAttribute::KTS_PRODUCT);
00159         swComp->setComponentFirmness(KactusAttribute::KTS_FIXED);
00160         swComp->setComponentImplementation(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
00161         swComp->setComponentSWType(KactusAttribute::KTS_SW_MAPPING);
00162 
00163         // Create the model parameter for mapping HW to SW.
00164         QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> modelParam(new ModelParameter());
00165         modelParam->setName("kts_hw_ref");
00166         modelParam->setValue(element.instanceName);
00167 
00168         QMap<QString, QSharedPointer<ModelParameter> > modelParameters;
00169         modelParameters.insert("kts_hw_ref", modelParam);
00170 
00171         // Create a design for the SW mapping component. Use the software mappings as a template
00172         // if found.
00173         VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, swVLNV.getVendor(), swVLNV.getLibrary(),
00174             swVLNV.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", swVLNV.getVersion());
00175 
00176         QSharedPointer<Design> swDesign(new Design(designVLNV));
00177         QList<Design::ComponentInstance> swInstances;
00178 
00179         // Parse software mappings if found.
00180         QSharedPointer<Component> comp = lh->getModel(element.componentRef).staticCast<Component>();
00181         View* swView = comp->findView("kts_sw_ref");
00182 
00183         if (swView != 0)
00184         {
00185             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(swView->getHierarchyRef());
00186             QSharedPointer<Design> swMapping = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00187 
00188             libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(lh->getModel(swMapping->getComponentInstances().at(0).componentRef));
00189             QSharedPointer<Component> swMappingComp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00190             View* swDesignView = swMappingComp->findView("kts_sw_ref");
00191 
00192             libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(lh->getModel(swDesignView->getHierarchyRef()));
00193             QSharedPointer<Design> softwareMap = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00194 
00195             foreach (Design::ComponentInstance instance, softwareMap->getComponentInstances())
00196             {
00197                 instance.imported = true;
00198                 swInstances.append(instance);
00199             }
00200 
00201             swDesign->setComponentInstances(swInstances);
00202             swDesign->setInterconnections(softwareMap->getInterconnections());
00203         }
00204 
00205         // Parse CPUs if found.
00206         swComp->setCpus(comp->getCpus());
00207 
00208         // Create the view for the design.
00209         View* hierView = new View("kts_sys_ref");
00210         hierView->setHierarchyRef(designVLNV);
00211         hierView->addEnvIdentifier("");
00212 
00213         // Initialize the model.
00214         Model* model = new Model();
00215         model->setModelParameters(modelParameters);
00216         model->addView(hierView);
00217         swComp->setModel(model);
00218 
00219         // Write object files.
00220         lh->writeModelToFile(directory, swDesign);
00221         lh->writeModelToFile(directory, swComp);
00222 
00223         //  Create the corresponding component instance and set its kts_hw_ref.
00224         Design::ComponentInstance swInstance(element.instanceName, element.displayName,
00225             QString(), swVLNV, QPointF(0, 0));
00226         swInstance.imported = true;
00227         swInstance.configurableElementValues.insert("kts_hw_ref", element.instanceName);
00228 
00229 
00230         // Add the newly created SW component to the list of SW instances.
00231         sysInstances.append(swInstance);
00232     }
00233 }
00234 
00235 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00236 // Function: generateSystemDesign()
00237 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00238 void generateSystemDesign(LibraryInterface* lh, QString const& directory,
00239                           VLNV const& designVLNV, Design& sysDesign)
00240 {
00241     // Parse all programmable elements from the HW component.
00242     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> elements;
00243     parseProgrammableElements(lh, designVLNV, elements);
00244 
00245     // Create SW mapping components for each programmable element.
00246     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> sysInstances;
00247     addNewInstances(elements, sysDesign, lh, directory, sysInstances);
00248 
00249     sysDesign.setComponentInstances(sysInstances);
00250 }
00251 
00252 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 // Function: updateSystemDesign()
00254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 void updateSystemDesign(LibraryInterface* lh, QString const& directory,
00256                         VLNV const& designVLNV, Design& sysDesign)
00257 {
00258     // Parse all programmable elements from the HW design.
00259     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> elements;
00260     parseProgrammableElements(lh, designVLNV, elements);
00261 
00262     // Reflect changes in the programmable elements to the system design.
00263     QList<Design::ComponentInstance> sysInstances;
00264 
00265     // 1. PHASE: Check already existing elements against the new list and remove those that
00266     // are no longer part of the new element list.
00267     foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, sysDesign.getComponentInstances())
00268     {
00269         // Imported ones should be checked.
00270         if (instance.imported)
00271         {
00272             // Search for the corresponding element in the new list.
00273             int index = getInstanceIndex(elements, instance.configurableElementValues.value("kts_hw_ref", ""));
00274 
00275             // If the element was removed, it is not added to the updated design.
00276             if (index == -1)
00277             {
00278                 continue;
00279             }
00280 
00281             sysInstances.append(instance);
00282 
00283             // Check for changes in the software mappings.
00284             Design::ComponentInstance const& element = elements[index];
00285             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = lh->getModel(element.componentRef).staticCast<Component>();
00286             View* swView = comp->findView("kts_sw_ref");
00287 
00288             if (swView != 0)
00289             {
00290                 // Retrieve the software mappings.
00291                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(swView->getHierarchyRef());
00292                 QSharedPointer<Design> swMapping = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00293 
00294                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(lh->getModel(swMapping->getComponentInstances().at(0).componentRef));
00295                 QSharedPointer<Component> swMappingComp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00296                 View* swDesignView = swMappingComp->findView("kts_sw_ref");
00297 
00298                 libComp = QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent>(lh->getModel(swDesignView->getHierarchyRef()));
00299                 QSharedPointer<Design> softwareMap = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00300 
00301                 QList<Design::ComponentInstance> softwareMapInstances = softwareMap->getComponentInstances();
00302                 QList<Design::Interconnection> softwareMapConnections = softwareMap->getInterconnections();
00303 
00304                 // Retrieve the old design for comparison.
00305                 libComp = lh->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00306                 swMappingComp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00307                 libComp = lh->getModel(swMappingComp->getHierRef("kts_sys_ref"));
00308                 QSharedPointer<Design> oldDesign = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00309 
00310                 QList<Design::ComponentInstance> swInstances;
00311                 QList<Design::Interconnection> swConnections;
00312 
00313                 // Update the instance list by first checking the current design against the new software mapping.
00314                 foreach (Design::ComponentInstance swInstance, oldDesign->getComponentInstances())
00315                 {
00316                     // Imported ones should be checked.
00317                     if (swInstance.imported)
00318                     {
00319                         int swIndex = getInstanceIndex(softwareMapInstances, swInstance.instanceName);
00320 
00321                         // If the element was found, it is kept in the updated design.
00322                         if (swIndex != -1)
00323                         {
00324                             swInstances.append(swInstance);
00325 
00326                             // Remove the connection from the software map instances since it has been processed.
00327                             softwareMapInstances.removeAt(swIndex);
00328                         }
00329                     }
00330                     else
00331                     {
00332                         // Non-imported instances are always kept.
00333                         swInstances.append(swInstance);
00334                     }
00335                 }
00336 
00337                 // Add the brand new instances at the end.
00338                 foreach (Design::ComponentInstance instance, softwareMapInstances)
00339                 {
00340                     instance.imported = true;
00341                     swInstances.append(instance);
00342                 }
00343 
00344                 // Same for the interconnections.
00345                 foreach (Design::Interconnection const& conn, oldDesign->getInterconnections())
00346                 {
00347                     // The interconnection is an imported one if both of its interfaces are
00348                     // found in the new software mapping design.
00349                     int index1 = getInstanceIndex(softwareMap->getComponentInstances(),
00350                                                   conn.interface1.componentRef);
00351                     int index2 = getInstanceIndex(softwareMap->getComponentInstances(),
00352                                                   conn.interface2.componentRef);
00353                     bool imported = (index1 != -1) && (index2 != -1);
00354 
00355                     if (imported)
00356                     {
00357                         // Keep only those imported connections that are found in the new software mapping design.
00358                         int connIndex = getConnectionIndex(softwareMapConnections, conn.name);
00359 
00360                         if (connIndex != -1)
00361                         {
00362                             swConnections.append(conn);
00363                             softwareMapConnections.removeAt(connIndex);
00364                         }
00365                     }
00366                     // Non-imported interconnections are kept if the interface1
00367                     // will still be part of the new design.
00368                     else if (getInstanceIndex(swInstances, conn.interface1.componentRef) != -1)
00369                     {
00370                         swConnections.append(conn);
00371                     }
00372                 }
00373 
00374                 // Add the brand new connections at the end.
00375                 foreach (Design::Interconnection const& conn, softwareMapConnections)
00376                 {
00377                     swConnections.append(conn);
00378                 }
00379 
00380                 oldDesign->setComponentInstances(swInstances);
00381                 oldDesign->setInterconnections(swConnections);
00382                 lh->writeModelToFile(oldDesign);
00383             }
00384 
00385             // Update CPUs to the mapping component.
00386             QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = lh->getModel(instance.componentRef);
00387             QSharedPointer<Component> swComp = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00388 
00389             swComp->setCpus(comp->getCpus());
00390             lh->writeModelToFile(swComp);
00391 
00392             // Remove the element from the element list since it has been processed.
00393             elements.removeAt(index);
00394         }
00395         else
00396         {
00397             // Non-imported instances are always kept.
00398             sysInstances.append(instance);
00399         }
00400     }
00401 
00402     // 2. PHASE: Add rest of the elements as brand new instances.
00403     addNewInstances(elements, sysDesign, lh, directory, sysInstances);
00404 
00405     sysDesign.setComponentInstances(sysInstances);
00406 }
